title: Trump and Zelensky appear more upbeat
description: Although both leaders express optimism in Florida there is no indication of progress, writes the BBC's Vitaliy Shevchenko.
content:
The much-anticipated talks lasted two-and-a-half hours, and that's an achievement in itself. Presidents Trump and Zelensky had never before spent this long in one room, negotiating.
Afterwards, optimism was much on display at Mar-a-Lago. It was a "te... [2022 chars]

title: Trump news at a glance: progress but no breakthrough in Ukraine peace talks
description: Donald Trump says ‘one or two tough’ issues could lead to negotiations breaking down – key US politics stories from 28 December at a glance
content:
President Donald Trump says Ukraine and Russia are “closer than ever before” to a peace deal, but he acknowledged negotiations could still break down and leave the war dragging on for years.
After a two-hour meeting in Florida with the Ukrainian pres... [331 chars]

title: Matthew Potts poised to play in fifth Ashes Test after England rule out Gus Atkinson
description: Tourists expected to pick fast bowler in XI for series finale at SCG, while the Cricket Australia boss is confident of a ‘good wicket’ in Sydney
content:
Matthew Potts is poised to play his first Ashes Test in Sydney after England confirmed that Gus Atkinson has been ruled out of the series finale.
Atkinson limped off with a hamstring issue on the second and final day of England’s rollercoaster four-w... [2416 chars]

title: Kosovo's ruling party wins election after months of political deadlock
description: The decisive victory for the Albanian nationalist Vetevendosje party means a third term for leader Albin Kurti.
content:
The Albanian nationalist Vetevendosje party has won a landslide victory in Kosovo's parliamentary elections, according to preliminary results.
With 90% of the votes counted, the party, whose name means "self determination", was on 50.8%, meaning a th... [3153 chars]

title: One killed in mid-air helicopter crash in New Jersey
description: Police and fire crews extinguished flames that engulfed one of the aircraft. Video from the scene showed a helicopter spinning rapidly to the ground.
content:
Two helicopters crashed into each other in the air in New Jersey, killing one person and critically injuring another.
Rescuers responded to a report of an aviation crash around 11.25am local time on Sunday, Hammonton police chief Kevin Friel said.
